title: Tuna steak with cannellini beans
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, chopped', '1 tin cannellini beans', '6 sunblushed tomatoes, chopped', '2 sprigs rosemary leaves, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 lemon', '2 tuna steaks', '1 rocket or pea shoot salad']
